extension.summary: Install xbmc addons.
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt
extension.description: Install xbmc addons.

extension.summary: Display recently added media.
extension.description: Display recently added media.[CR][CR]Can display recently added movies, episodes and music videos. All controlled by skinner passing args.[CR][CR]args: "limit": limits the number of returned items.

extension.summary: Find and display song lyrics including LRC (simple format).
extension.description: Find and display song lyrics from the Internet. Uses embedded lyrics if available. Ability to play and tag LRC (simple format) lyrics. Can be set to auto-scroll non LRC lyrics.[CR][CR]Primary and fall-back scrapers. Artist's song lists if no song match was found. Artist aliases if no artist match was found.[CR][CR]Can run as a stand alone script (GUI mode) or in the background.[CR][CR]*See readme.txt for a full description (can be viewed from settings).
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt

extension.summary: Find and display song lyrics including LRC (simple format).
extension.description: Find and display song lyrics from the internet. Uses embedded lyrics if available. Abilty to play and tag LRC (simple format) lyrics. Can be set to autoscroll untagged lyrics.[CR][CR]Primary and fallback scrapers. Artist's song lists if no song match was found. Artist aliases if no artist match was found.[CR][CR]Can run as a stand alone script (gui mode) or in the background.[CR][CR]*See readme.txt for a full description (can be viewed from settings).
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt

extension.summary: European radio stations streaming live on the internet
Európai internetes rádiók
extension.description: Welcome to listenlive.eu, a web radio directory showcasing over 4000 radio stations from across Europe streaming live on the internet.
A listenlive.eu több mint 4000 élo rádióadást tartalmaz Európából, melyeket az interneten keresztül érhetsz el.

extension.summary: Watch current movie trailers from apple.com.
extension.disclaimer: Only the most recent 100 or so trailers are listed.
extension.description: Watch current movie trailers from http://trailers.apple.com/.[CR][CR]Check movie showtimes for theaters in your area.

extension.summary: View videos of the latest news from CNN.
extension.disclaimer: CNN slants their views liberally. (Obama media)
extension.description: View videos of the latest news from CNN.

extension.summary: List torrent download folder.
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt
extension.description: List torrent download folder.

extension.summary: Stream and download scene releases from the megaupload links listed on Icefilms.info
extension.description: Turns your XBMC into an instant free on-demand media-center. Stream and download to your library pure .avi scene releases, in DVD and HD720p quality. Browse and search the library of over 77,000 videos with metadata and posters. Never experience the frustration of dead video links!

extension.summary: Play Karaoke videos from KaraokePlay.com
extension.description: KaraokePlay has thousands of karaoke videos from youtube indexed. This allows you to browse and play them from xbmc.

extension.summary: Watch movie trailers and check showtimes.
extension.description: Watch movie trailers from http://trailers.apple.com/ and other sites using python based scrapers. Check movie showtimes for theaters in your area.[CR][CR]Includes the optional ability to search for trailers for movies in your library. [I](see readme)[/I][CR][CR]*Can also be used in conjunction with the "Home Theater Experience" add-on. Requires skin support for all features.
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt

extension.summary: Stream NOS Journaal (www.nos.nl)
extension.description: Stream NOS Journaal (www.nos.nl)

extension.summary: Play videos and radio recordings from the Icelandic National Radio's website
extension.description: An Iceland IP-Address is required to use this because of geoblocking

extension.summary: Stream videos from different sites
extension.description: Stream videos from YouTube, Clipfish, Kino.de, Computerclub², ARD & ZDF Mediathek, 3sat, Schweizer Fernsehen etc. Also live channels from different regions (DE, EN, FR, NL, SE, SP, THA, VN) and categories (kids, sports, music) are supported.

extension.summary: Find, download and play videos from YouTube.
extension.description: Find, download and play videos from YouTube. Supports HD videos.

extension.summary: Install Add-ons from Nuka1195's Unofficial Add-on Repository.
extension.description: Download and install add-ons from Nuka1195's unofficial add-on repository.[CR][CR]By using this repository you will be able to take advantage of cutting edge features our contributors constantly develop and update.[CR][CR]Thanks to all our contributors.
extension.disclaimer: Nuka1195 did not make all the add-ons on this repository and is not responsible for their content

extension.summary: Watch movie trailers.
extension.description: Watch movie trailers from http://trailers.apple.com/. Check movie showtimes for theaters in your area.

extension.summary: Re-create a full movie theater experience.
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt
extension.description: Play trailers, slideshows, intro videos, outro videos: To re-create a movie theater experience in the comfort of your home.
Reproduce Avances, presentaciones, videos de intro, videos de outro: Para recrear una experiencia como si estuvieses en una sala de Cine en la comodidad de tu casa.

extension.summary: Re-create a full movie theater experience.
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt
extension.description: Play trailers, slideshows, intro videos, outro videos: To re-create a movie theater experience in the comfort of your home.
Reproduce Avances, presentaciones, videos de intro, videos de outro: Para recrear una experiencia como si estuvieses en una sala de Cine en la comodidad de tu casa.

extension.summary: Module handles searching, fetching and localizing weather.
extension.description: Module handles searching, fetching and localizing weather.

extension.summary: Module emulates XBMC xbmcaddon module.
extension.description: Module emulates XBMC xbmcaddon module.

extension.summary: Creates Python html help docs and PyDev Predefined Completions for XBMC Python modules.
extension.description: Creates Python html help docs and PyDev Predefined Completions for XBMC Python modules. (xbmc, xbmcaddon, xbmcgui, xbmcplugin and xbmcvfs)
extension.disclaimer: Only accurate for the version of XBMC this add-on was run in.

extension.summary: Play your tv shows theme while browsing your library
extension.description: Play your tv shows theme while browsing your library.
extension.disclaimer: Requires a theme.mp3 in your tv shows root folder.

extension.summary: Confluence skin by Jezz_X. (XBMC's default skin)
Confluence skin. Készítő: Jezz_X
Confluence skin door Jezz_X
Jezz_X开发的Confluence皮肤
extension.description: Confluence is the default skin for XBMC 9.11 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time XBMC users to understand and use.

A Confluence az alapértelmezett skin az XBMC-hez a 9.11-es verziótól kezdődően. Merít sok sok népszerű skin elképzeléséből, megpróbálva vegyíteni a jó ötleteket úgy, hogy az könnyen kezelhető legyen az XBMC-vel először találkozóknak is.

Confluence is de standaard skin voor XBMC 9.11 en hoger. Het combineert de concepten van andere populaire skins, waarbij het tracht hun goede ideëen te integreren in een skin die gemakkelijk in gebruik is.
在XBMC 9.11之后的版本中Confluence是默认皮肤。它集合了许多流行皮肤的创意，力求把这些优点融合到一个皮肤中，使得首次使用XBMC的用户能更容易上手。
extension.disclaimer: Confluence is the default skin for XBMC, removing it may cause issues
A Confluence az alapértelmezett XBMC skin. Annak eltávolítása problémákat okozhat.
Confluence is de standaard XMBC skin, het verwijderen van Confluence kan leiden tot problemen.
Confluence是XMBC的默认皮肤，删除它可能导致故障。

extension.summary: Fusion skin by Arcanthur
extension.description: Fusion is all about simplicity, usability, and refinement. Taking what others have achieved in the past and making an attempt to improve upon those ideas.

extension.summary: Weather conditions from weather.com.
extension.description: Weather conditions from weather.com.[CR][CR]Provides current weather conditions and a five day outlook.

extension.summary: Supplemental weather forecasts & radar.
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt
extension.description: Get supplemental weather forecasts, radars and maps from weather.com. Requires skin support.[CR][CR]You may install optional packages from configure. (eg. map pack)

extension.summary: Current weather conditions and colorful forecasts.
extension.description: Originally by Nuka1195.[CR][CR]This is the advanced weather source.[CR][CR]It provides not only current weather conditions but also extended forecasts and information including forecast videos and weather alerts.[CR][CR]Default weather provider is Weather.com, and you can use alternative providers such as Accuweather.com or NOAA.
